title: Episode 48 - Japan - Occupation
itunes:author: The History of the Cold War Podcast
itunes:summary: In this episode were going to examine how the actual occupation of Japan unfolded versus how it was planned by the Americans and anticipated by the Japanese. We examine how the US ran Japan and established a new Japanese government. The rise of PanPan culture in post war Japan and the state of life in early post war Japan.
